column5: Was watching a tv show the other day and they were at that lodge. Went on their website so get another look and very impressive! A bit to much for me$$ but it's a 1st quality lodge TV show: https://fishncanada.com/episode-476-...perfect-storm/ Website: http://hawk-lake.com/accommodations/
Al Linder has a show fishing at Hawk lake lodge that's a good one to watch also. I must agree its alot of $$ for a fishing adventure.
Babe Winkelman has been there, too. You can watch this on YouTube. Angling Edge also did a segment where the guys were fishing the portage lakes adjacent to Hawk Lake. Great wintertime viewing.
Hey - I have fished there 4 times in the last 3 years. I have posted a few trip reports. It is a special place.B-
